item.description:
Member, Greg, is kind enough to host this meetup as I sort out venue difficulties. I will be coming, as will he, obviously. That's guitar and tenor sax so far, and this will not happen without at lease a bass, preferably drums too. Max of 6 because the space is limited, so RSVP asap.

Feel free to bring drinks and snacks.
item.how_to_find_us: Call 781-316-8032 (ask for Greg) or call 781-325-6084 (ask for me, Ed)
item.name: Arlington Sunday Jam
